scripts.push:ecr: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin $ECR_REGISTRY && docker push $ECR_REGISTRY/reyva-ecommerce:latest
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:docker && npm run push:ecr && npm run deploy:aws
scripts.migrate:prod: cd apps/api && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.seed:prod: cd apps/api && npx prisma db seed
